body: Antonello, Thanks for posting such a comprehensive demonstration of the Ladybug components.  I'll just add one more thing that might be useful for visualizing the data, which is that you can plot the avgMonthlyPerHour data on the "Monthly Bar Chart if you so desire: [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/HnQKU2LSbWhwwoxWg4aRKwMam3mPixY8YEKsQrhA6BaIj1bOCS2LFUcLDrDZ04ZH544W5-mI1hjwc412RcqHv1yYOtNabHgV/MonthBarChart1.JPG) [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/HnQKU2LSbWiJxBCYPKFlZCgeSXkn9HEX*cR2TZeVET-1zSJmgAgEHcW9-rEq60P8A*XEMS3JZ*oHj-zxdDMsgVI4wrs1zTnN/MonthBarChart2.JPG) -Chris
